name: Jean-Ann's Cake--Sock-It-To-Me
author: In Memory of Ella I. Schlosser

ingredients.name: box Duncan Hines golden butter mix

instructions: Mix together cake mix, oil, sugar, eggs, and sour cream. Then mix brown sugar, cinnamon, and nuts. Starting with sugar mixture, alternate these two mixtures until all is gone into a tube pan. Bake at 350Â° for 1 hour.
